==Descriptions==
{{Description|Al-Ahmar had no enemies, for all who paid him no homage would be destroyed by servants that issue from this place and thus be rendered down to naught but a handful of sand.|[[Scarlet Sand Slate#Delving Deeper|Scarlet Sand Slate: Delving Deeper]]}}

==Trivia==
* The hall is filled with [[Primal Construct]]s that are identical to the [[Algorithm of Semi-Intransient Matrix of Overseer Network]] boss, but they will not attack the player.

===Etymology===
* The {{Lang|''{{w|Sekhem scepter}}''|egy=sḫm}} is a type of ritual scepter in ancient Egypt.
